name: Phoebe
introduction: Lady of Nirvana, Blessing of the Empire
description: She is quiet, but she is constantly observing those around her. She enjoys finding people's weaknesses because it makes her feel like she's in control. And one more thing: she loves to contradict others.

passiveSkill.name: Rebirth
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "Phoebe's ATK in battle increases by {placeholder}. On death, she revives and receives {placeholder} ATK, {placeholder} DEF, {placeholder} HP, and {placeholder} Rage. Triggers 1 time per battle.Lineup Skill:Activation Requirement: Deploy at least 5 Light or Healing class partners.Activation Reward: When Phoebe appears, she grants Invincible status to 3 random Ally units, lasts 20 seconds."}

uniqueSkill.name: Phoenix's Blessing
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Phoebe unleashes the power of the ancient kingdom from the scroll. Attacks the enemy team and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, reducing the targets' DEF by {placeholder} for 10 seconds."}

specialSkill.name: Princess' Order
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "The light of the dynasty protects allies. Phoebe attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage. Grants a shield with {placeholder} HP to self and ally Leader.Chance to use skill: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Kurobane
normalSkill.description: Phoebe tosses sharp Kurobane knives. Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Phoebe unleashes the power of the ancient kingdom from the scroll. Attacks the enemy team and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage, reducing the targets' DEF by {placeholder} for 10 seconds.
